properties.description: Hue Service

properties.label: name
properties.description: The name of the Hue service

properties.label: description
properties.description: The description of the Hue service

properties.label: VxNet
properties.description: Choose a vxnet to join
hue service properties
properties.label: hue-server
count
properties.description: Number of nodes for the cluster to create

properties.label: CPU
properties.description: CPUs of each node

properties.label: Memory
properties.description: memory of each node (in MB)

properties.label: instance class
properties.description: The instance type for the cluster to run, such as high performance, high performance plus

properties.label: volume size
properties.description: The volume size for each instance
Hive service properties

properties.label: secret_key
properties.description: This is used for secure hashing in the session store

properties.label: hadoop_app_id
properties.description: The hadoop app id in use, the default value is set of QingCloud hadoop app id

properties.label: hadoop_cluster_id
properties.description: The default hadoop cluster id in hue. if it is blank, it will choose the first hadoop_app_id cluster created in vxnet

properties.label: zookeeper_app_id
properties.description: The zookeeper app id in use, the default value is set of QingCloud zookeeper app id

properties.label: spark_app_id
properties.description: The spark app id in use, the default value is set of QingCloud spark app id

properties.label: spark_cluster_id
properties.description: The default spark cluster id in hue. if it is blank, it will choose the first spark_app_id cluster created in vxnet

properties.label: hive_app_id
properties.description: The hive app id in use, the default value is set of QingCloud hive app id

properties.label: hive_cluster_id
properties.description: The default hive cluster id in hue. if it is blank, it will choose the first hive_app_id cluster created in vxnet

properties.label: hbase_app_id
properties.description: The hbase app id in use, the default value is set of QingCloud hbase app id

properties.label: database
properties.description: The hue metadata database

properties.label: database_engine
properties.description: The engine of matadata database

properties.label: database_name
properties.description: The hue metadata database name

properties.label: database_host
properties.description: The hue metadata database host

properties.label: database_port
properties.description: The hue metadata database port

properties.label: database_user
properties.description: The hue metadata database user

properties.label: database_password
properties.description: The hue metadata database password
